analyzed: catasraḥ yonayaḥ katamāḥ catasraḥ aṇḍa jā yoniḥ jarāyu jā yoniḥ sa sveda jā yoniḥ aupapādukā yoniḥ

analyzed: yaḥ sau bhikṣuḥ kāme vigata rāgaḥ pūrvavat tasya citta na praskandati na prasīdati na santiṣṭhate na adhimucyate ātaptāya anuyogāya

analyzed: ṣaṭ āyuṣmantaḥ dharmāḥ bhagavatā svayam abhijñāya abhisabudhya ākhyātāḥ

analyzed: yat uta ṣaḍ ādhyātmika āyatanāni katamāni ṣaḍ cakṣuḥ ādhyātmikam āyatana śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāyaḥ manaḥ ādhyātmikam āyatanam

analyzed: tān vaya sahitāḥ samagrāḥ samodamānāḥ bhūtvā pūrvavat yāvat deva manuṣyāṇā

original: Wal_6.2 ṣaḍ bāhyāyatanāni / katamāni ṣaṭ / rūpaṁ bāhyāyatanaṁ / śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṁ dharmo bāhyāyatanaṁ /
analyzed: ṣaḍ bāhyāyatanāni katamāni ṣaḍ rūpa bāhyāyatana śabdaḥ gandhaḥ rasaḥ spraṣṭavya dharmaḥ bāhyāyatana

original: Wal_6.3 ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣurvijñānaṁ śrotraghrānajihvākāyamanovijñānaṁ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ vijñāna kāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣuḥ vijñāna śrotra ghrāna jihvā kāya manaḥ vijñāna

original: Wal_6.4 ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣuḥsaṁsparśaḥ / śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ sparśa kāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣuḥ sa sparśaḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ sa sparśaḥ

original: Wal_6.5 ṣaḍ vedanākāyāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣuḥsaṁsparśajā vedanā / śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśajā vedanā /
analyzed: ṣaṭ vedanā kāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣuḥ sa sparśa jā vedanā śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ sa sparśa jā vedanā

original: Wal_6.6 ṣaṭ saṁjñākāyāḥ / cakṣuḥsaṁsparśajā saṁjñā / śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśajā saṁjñā /
analyzed: ṣaṭ sajñākāyāḥ cakṣuḥ sa sparśa jā sajñā śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ sa sparśa jā sajñā

original: Wal_6.7 ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣuḥsaṁsparśajā cetanā / śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśajā cetanā /
analyzed: ṣaṭ cetanā kāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣuḥ sa sparśa jā cetanā śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ sa sparśa jā cetanā

original: Wal_6.8 ṣaṭ tṛṣṇākāyāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣuḥsaṁsparśajā tṛṣṇā / śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṁsparśajā tṛṣṇā /
analyzed: ṣaṭ tṛṣṇā kāyāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣuḥ sa sparśa jā tṛṣṇā śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ sa sparśa jā tṛṣṇā

original: Wal_6.9 ṣaḍ dharmā hānabhāgīyāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / buddhe agauravo viharati / dharme agauravo
analyzed: ṣaṭ dharmāḥ hāna bhāgīyāḥ katame ṣaṭ buddhe agauravaḥ viharati dharme agauravaḥ

original: viharati / saṁghe agauravo viharati / śikṣāyāṁ agauravo viharati / daurvacasyaś ca
analyzed: viharati saghe agauravaḥ viharati śikṣāyāḥ agauravaḥ viharati daurvacasyaḥ ca

original: pāpamitraś ca bhavati /
analyzed: pāpa mitraḥ ca bhavati

original: Wal_6.10 ṣaḍ dharmā viśeṣabhāgīyāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / buddhe gauravo viharati / dharme gauravo
analyzed: ṣaṭ dharmāḥ viśeṣa bhāgīyāḥ katame ṣaṭ buddhe gauravaḥ viharati dharme gauravaḥ

original: viharati / saṁghe gauravo viharati / śikṣāyāṁ gauravo viharati / sauvacasyaś ca kalyāṇamitraś ca bhavati /
analyzed: viharati saghe gauravaḥ viharati śikṣāyāḥ gauravaḥ viharati sauvacasyaḥ ca kalyāṇa mitraḥ ca bhavati

original: Wal_6.11 ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni
analyzed: ṣaṭ saumanasya upavicārāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasya sthānīyāni

original: rūpāṇy upavicarati / śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyān śabdān upavicarati /
analyzed: rūpāṇi upavicarati śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasya sthānīyān śabdān upavicarati

original: ghrāṇena gandhān jighritvā saumanasyasthānīyān gandhān upavicarati / jihvayā rasān
analyzed: ghrāṇena gandhān jighritvā saumanasya sthānīyān gandhān upavicarati jihvayā rasān

original: svāditvā saumanasyasthānīyān rasān upavicarati / kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni
analyzed: svāditvā saumanasya sthānīyān rasān upavicarati kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭvā saumanasya sthānīyāni

original: spraṣṭavyāny upavicarati / manasā dharmān vijñāya saumanasyasthānīyān dharmān upavicarati /
analyzed: spraṣṭavyāni upavicarati manasā dharmān vijñāya saumanasya sthānīyān dharmān upavicarati

original: Wal_6.12 ṣaḍ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyasthānīyāni
analyzed: ṣaṭ daurmanasya upavicārāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasya sthānīyāni

original: rūpāṇy upavicarati / śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā daurmanasyasthānīyān śabdān upavicarati /
analyzed: rūpāṇi upavicarati śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā daurmanasya sthānīyān śabdān upavicarati

original: ghrāṇena gandhān jighritvā daurmanasyasthānīyān gandhān upavicarati / jihvayā rasān
analyzed: ghrāṇena gandhān jighritvā daurmanasya sthānīyān gandhān upavicarati jihvayā rasān

original: svāditvā daurmanasyasthānīyān rasān upavicarati / kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭvā daurmanasyasthānīyāni
analyzed: svāditvā daurmanasya sthānīyān rasān upavicarati kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭvā daurmanasya sthānīyāni

original: spraṣṭavyāny upavicarati / manasā dharmān vijñāya daurmanasyasthānīyān dharmān upavicarati /
analyzed: spraṣṭavyāni upavicarati manasā dharmān vijñāya daurmanasya sthānīyān dharmān upavicarati

original: Wal_6.13 ṣaḍ upekṣopavicārāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā upekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇy
analyzed: ṣaṭ upekṣā upavicārāḥ katame ṣaṭ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā upekṣā sthānīyāni rūpāṇi

original: upavicarati / śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā upekṣāsthānīyān śabdān upavicarati / ghrāṇena
analyzed: upavicarati śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā upekṣā sthānīyān śabdān upavicarati ghrāṇena

original: gandhān jighritvopekṣāsthānīyān gandhān upavicarati / jihvayā rasān svāditvopekṣāsthānīyān
analyzed: gandhān jighritvā upekṣā sthānīyān gandhān upavicarati jihvayā rasān svāditvā upekṣā sthānīyān

original: rasān upavicarati / kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭvopakṣāsthānīyāni spraṣṭavyāny upavicarati /
analyzed: rasān upavicarati kāyena spraṣṭavyāni spṛṣṭvā upakṣā sthānīyāni spraṣṭavyāni upavicarati

original: manasā dharmān vijñāyopekṣāsthānīyān dharmān upavicarati /
analyzed: manasā dharmān vijñāya upekṣā sthānīyān dharmān upavicarati

original: Wal_6.14.1 ṣaṭ sātatavihārāḥ // katame ṣaṭ / iha bhikṣuś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ saṁprajānan
analyzed: ṣaṭ sātatavihārāḥ katame ṣaṭ iha bhikṣuḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na eva sumanāḥ bhavati na durmanāḥ upekṣakaḥ viharati smṛtaḥ sa prajānan

original: Wal_6.14.2 śrotreṇa śabdān ghrāṇena gandhāñ jihvayā rasān kāyena spraṣṭavyān manasā dharmān vijñāya naiva sumanā bhavati na durmanā upekṣako  #
analyzed: śrotreṇa śabdān ghrāṇena gandhām jihvayā rasān kāyena spraṣṭavyān manasā dharmān vijñāya na eva su manāḥ bhavati na durmanāḥ upekṣakaḥ

original: viharati smṛtaḥ saṁprajānan /
analyzed: viharati smṛtaḥ sa prajānan

analyzed: ṣaṭ dhātavaḥ katame ṣaṭ pṛthivī dhātuḥ ap dhātuḥ tejaḥ dhātuḥ vāyu dhātuḥ ākāśa dhātuḥ vijñānandhātuḥ

analyzed: ṣaṭ niḥsaraṇīyāḥ dhātavaḥ katame ṣaṭ iha āyuṣmantaḥ bhikṣuḥ eva vadet maitraḥ me

analyzed: cetaḥ samādhiḥ āsevitaḥ bhāvitaḥ bahulīkṛtaḥ ca punar me vyāpādaḥ citta paryādāya

original: tiṣṭhati pūrvavad yathā daśottare /
analyzed: tiṣṭhati pūrvavat yathā daśa uttare

original: Wal_6.17 ṣaḍ vivādamūlāni / katamāni ṣaṭ /
analyzed: ṣaḍ vivāda mūlāni katamāni ṣaḍ

original: Wal_6.17.1.a ihaikatyaḥ krodhano bhavaty upanāhī / yo ’sau krodhano bhavaty upanāhī sa śāstāraṁ
analyzed: iha ekatyaḥ krodhanaḥ bhavati upanāhī  yaḥ u sau krodhanaḥ bhavati upanāhī sa śāstāra

original: na satkaroti na gurukaroti na mānayati na pūjayati / sa śāstāram asatkurvan agurukurvan
analyzed: na satkaroti na gurukaroti na mānayati na pūjayati sa śāstāram a satkurvan a gurukurvan

analyzed: a mānayan a pūjayan dharma na paśyati dharmam a paśyan śrāmaṇye anavekṣaḥ bhavati

analyzed: yaḥ śrāmaṇye anavekṣaḥ sa saghe tad rūpa janayati kalaha bhaṇḍana vigraha vivāda

original: yo bhavati kalahakārī sa bhaviṣyati bahujanānarthāya bahujanāhitāya bahujanaduḥkhāyānarthāyāhitāya
analyzed: yaḥ bhavati kalaha kārī sa bhaviṣyati bahu jana anarthāya bahu jana ahitāya bahu jana duḥkhāya anarthāya ahitāya

original: duḥkhāya devamanuṣyāṇām /
analyzed: duḥkhāya deva manuṣyāṇām

original: Wal_6.17.1.b ata evaṁrūpaṁ yūyaṁ vivādamūlaṁ saty adhyātmaṁ vā bahirdhā vā aprahīyaṁ samanupaśyata
analyzed: atas evarūpa yūya vivāda mūla sati adhyātma vā bahirdhā vā a prahīya samanupaśyata

original: tatas saṁhitaiḥ samagraiḥ saṁmodamānair avivadamānās tīvraś cotsāhanī cotsuḍhiś cāprativāṇiś
analyzed: tatas sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ samodamānaiḥ a vivadamānāḥ tīvraḥ ca utsāhanī ca utsuḍhiḥ ca aprativāṇiḥ

original: ca smṛtyā saṁprajanyena ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ / evaṁ tad vivādamūlam utpannaṁ prahāṇam /
analyzed: ca smṛtyā sa prajanyena ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ eva tat vivāda mūlam utpanna prahāṇam

original: Wal_6.17.1.c ata evaṁrūpaṁ yūyaṁ vivādamūlaṁ saty adhyātmaṁ vā bahirdhā vā prahīyaṁ samanupaśyata
analyzed: atas evarūpa yūya vivāda mūla sati adhyātma vā bahirdhā vā prahīya samanupaśyata

original: tatas saṁhitaiḥ samagraiḥ saṁmodamānair avivadamānās tīvraś cetasa ārakṣasmṛtir apramādena
analyzed: tatas sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ samodamānaiḥ a vivadamānāḥ tīvraḥ cetasaḥ ārakṣa smṛtiḥ apramādena

original: ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ / … mahatīm āyatyāṁ notpatsyate /
analyzed: ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ mahatīm āyatyā na utpatsyate

original: yathā krodhano bhavaty upanāhī / evaṁ mrakṣī pradāśī / īrṣyako matsarī / śaṭho māyāvī /
analyzed: yathā krodhanaḥ bhavati upanāhī  eva mrakṣī pradāśī īrṣyakaḥ matsarī śaṭhaḥ māyāvī

original: mithyādṛṣti … svayaṁdṛṣṭiparāmarśy asamañjasagrāhī duṣpratiniḥsargam … yo bhikṣur
analyzed: mithyādṛṣti svayam dṛṣṭi parāmarśī asamañjasa grāhī duṣpratiniḥsargam yaḥ bhikṣuḥ

original: bhavati svayaṁdṛṣṭiparāmarśy asamañjasagrāhī duṣpratiniḥsargaṁ … sa śāstāraṁ na satkaroti
analyzed: bhavati svayam dṛṣṭi parāmarśī asamañjasa grāhī duṣpratiniḥsarga sa śāstāra na satkaroti

original: pūrvavad yāvad āyatyāṁ notpatsyate /
analyzed: pūrvavat yāvat āyatyāḥ na utpatsyate

original: Wal_6.18 ṣaṭ saṁraṁjanīyā dharmāḥ / katame ṣaṭ / maitraṁ me kāyakarma pratyupasthitaṁ bhaviṣyati
analyzed: ṣaṭ sarajanīyāḥ dharmāḥ katame ṣaṭ maitra me kāya karma pratyupasthita bhaviṣyati

original: śāstur antike vijñānāñ ca sabrahmacāriṇāṁ / ayaṁ dharmaḥ saṁraṁjanīyaḥ pūrvavad yathā daśotare /
analyzed: śāstuḥ antike vijñānām ca sabrahmacāriṇā dharmaḥ sarajanīyaḥ pūrvavat yathā daśa utare

original: Wal_6.19 ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ / katamāḥ ṣaṭ / ṛddhiviṣayā divyaṁ śrotraṁ cetaḥparyāyaḥ pūrvanivāsa cyutyupapāda āsravakṣayaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaḍ abhijñāḥ katamāḥ ṣaḍ ṛddhi viṣayāḥ divya śrotra cetaḥparyāyaḥ pūrva nivāsa cyuti upapādaḥ āsrava kṣayaḥ

original: Wal_6.20 ṣaḍ vidyābhāgīyāḥ saṁjñāḥ / katamāḥ ṣaṭ / anityasaṁjñānitye duḥkhasaṁjñā duḥkhe ’nātmasaṁjñā āhāre pratikūlasaṁjñā sarvaloke ’nabhiratasaṁjñā  #
analyzed: ṣaḍ vidyābhāgīyāḥ sajñāḥ katamāḥ ṣaḍ anitya sajñā anitye duḥkha sajñā duḥkhe na ātma sajñā āhāre pratikūla sajñā sarva loke nabhirata sajñā

original: maraṇasaṁjñā /
analyzed: maraṇa sajñā

original: Wal_6.21 ṣaḍ anusmṛtayaḥ / buddhānusmṛtir dharmānusmṛtiḥ saṁghānusmṛtiḥ śīlānusmṛtiḥ tyāgānusmṛtir devatānusmṛtiḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ anusmṛtayaḥ buddha anusmṛtiḥ dharma anusmṛtiḥ sagha anusmṛtiḥ śīla anusmṛtiḥ tyāga anusmṛtiḥ devatā anusmṛtiḥ

original: Wal_6.22 ṣaḍ ānuttaryāṇi / darśanānuttaryaṁ śravaṇānuttaryaṁ lābhānuttaryaṁ śikṣānuttaryaṁ paricaryānuttaryam anusmṛtyānuttaryam /
analyzed: ṣaḍ ānuttaryāṇi darśana anuttarya śravaṇa anuttarya lābha anuttarya śikṣā anuttarya paricaryā anuttaryam anusmṛtyānuttaryam

original: Wal_6.23 ṣaḍ avekṣāḥ / rūpāvekṣā śabdāvekṣā gandhavekṣā rasāvekṣā sparṣṭavyāvekṣā dharmāvekṣā /
analyzed: ṣaṭ avekṣāḥ rūpa avekṣā śabda avekṣā gandha avekṣā rasa avekṣā sparṣṭavya avekṣā dharma avekṣā

original: Wal_6.24 ṣaḍ abhijātayaḥ / katamāḥ ṣaṭ / kṛṣṇābhijātīyaḥ pudgalaḥ kṛṣṇān dharmān abhijāyate /
analyzed: ṣaḍ abhijātayaḥ katamāḥ ṣaḍ kṛṣṇa abhijātīyaḥ pudgalaḥ kṛṣṇān dharmān abhijāyate

original: kṛṣṇābhijātīyaḥ pudgalaḥ śuklān dharmān abhijāyate / kṛṣṇābhijātīyaḥ pudgalaḥ akṛṣṇam
analyzed: kṛṣṇa abhijātīyaḥ pudgalaḥ śuklān dharmān abhijāyate kṛṣṇa abhijātīyaḥ pudgalaḥ a kṛṣṇam
